string.name: bind_fail_tips
string.value: Connection failed. Please initialize the server first, then restart this application and connect again.

string.name: message_not_send_tips
string.value: Please enter the message to be sent

string.name: connect_server_tips
string.value: Please connect to the server first

string.name: application_tips
string.value: Please open the server-side application first and initialize the server-side. Open the client application again and connect to the server.

string.name: internet_permission_reason
string.value: Used for cross process communication using the Internet network.
